compatibility.notes: The GFDL-1.3-no-invariants-only license allows for weak copyleft, meaning that while modifications to the licensed work must be shared under the same license, it can be combined with other works under more permissive licenses without imposing the same requirements on those works.

key_requirements: The Document must be distributed under the same license if modified.
Invariant Sections cannot be included in this variant of the license.
license.name: GFDL-1.3-no-invariants-only
obligations: Must include a copy of the license when distributing the Document.
Must state changes made to the Document if modified.
